name: rcbf-prep
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Performs integration of rCBF as produced by Siemens scanners with FreeSurfer analysis in preparation for group analysis.

inputs.description: Output directory where results will be stored.
inputs.name: Output directory

inputs.description: Input rCBF volume to be registered to the FreeSurfer anatomical.
inputs.name: rCBF volume

inputs.description: Subject identifier for FreeSurfer anatomical registration.
inputs.name: Subject

inputs.description: ROI table specifying which ROIs will be summarized, e.g., FreeSurferColorLUT.txt.
inputs.name: ROI table

inputs.description: Registration data file instead of a subject.
inputs.name: Register file

inputs.description: Template file used instead of rCBF itself.
inputs.name: Template file

output-files.description: Registered and resampled rCBF volume for left hemisphere.
output-files.name: Left Hemisphere rCBF

output-files.description: Registered and resampled rCBF volume for right hemisphere.
output-files.name: Right Hemisphere rCBF

output-files.description: rCBF volume resampled to MNI305 space.
output-files.name: MNI305 rCBF
